articles.description: NEW YORK (REUTERS) - Infectious disease experts are weighing the need for booster shots of the Pfizer-BioNTech or Moderna mRNA-based vaccines for Americans who received Johnson & Johnson's one-dose vaccine due to the increasing prevalence of the more contagio…

articles.title: US Ex-Police Officer Sentenced To Over 22 Years For George Floyd Murder - NDTV
articles.description: Former policeman Derek Chauvin was sentenced to 22 and a half years in jail Friday for murdering African American George Floyd, a killing that sparked America's biggest demonstrations for racial justice in decades.
articles.content:
